Ingredients.2: 2 (3 ounce) packages raspberry-flavored gelatin mix (such as Jell-O®)

Ingredients.4: 1 (15 ounce) package frozen raspberries in syrup, thawed and undrained

Directions.1: Butter a 9-inch tube pan. Break angel food cake into chunks; set aside.

Directions.2: Stir raspberry gelatin and boiling water together in a bowl until gelatin is dissolved; place gelatin in the refrigerator to cool slightly, about 10 minutes. Stir raspberries with syrup into gelatin.

Directions.3: Beat cream in a chilled glass or metal bowl with an electric mixer until soft peaks form; fold whipped cream into raspberry mixture.

Directions.4: Pour about 1/4 cup of raspberry mixture into prepared pan. Place 1/3 of cake chunks into pan; pour 1/3 of remaining raspberry mixture over cake. Repeat layering with remaining ingredients, ending with the raspberry mixture. Chill in refrigerator until firm, about 2 hours.

Directions.5: To remove from pan, center a serving plate over tube pan; invert.
